name: Luckily, My Arm Is A Shotgun
name_original: Luckily, My Arm Is A Shotgun
description:
Stranded on a cursed island overrun by monstrous creatures, your only hope for survival is your trusty shotgun arm. Traverse a treacherous mini-open-world, blasting through hordes of zombies, floating eyes, and explosive demons as you navigate through dense jungles, murky lakes, towering mountains, and decrepit abandoned buildings.

As you gather the necessary parts to repair your boat and make your escape, the clock is ticking and the monsters are closing in. Can you survive the horrors of this cursed island and make it out alive? Play now and find out in this heart-pumping, action-packed adventure!
